track.name: Mathematics
track.descriptions: Without mathematics, there's nothing you can do. Everything around you is mathematics. Everything around you is numbers.

primary_contest.description:
Welcome to Ad Infinitum (To Infinity) a programming competition, purely in the mathematics domain.
Tie breaking/ Penalty will be Submit Time of last challenge - view time of first challenge, allowing you to start late.
But once started finish soon :)
You can code in the 20+ languages as mentioned here: HackerRank Environment

Sponsored by Open Futures, Click Here for more details.

Prizes

1 Apple iPad Mini( 16GB with wi-fi)
1 All-New Kindle Wifi e-reader
2 vouchers each of Rs. 2000 for Amazon India
2 vouchers each of Rs. 1000 for Amazon India
4 vouchers each of Rs. 500 for Amazon India
20 T-shirts of Open Futures

Prizes are only for Open Futures job applicants. Job openings for Indian Residents only.
primary_contest.name: Ad Infinitum 10 - Math Programming Contest

model.preview: How many ways are there to choose exactly R toppings from N toppings?
model.name: Cheese and Random Toppings
